page.title:
2nd CEOS/WGCV/LPV Workshop on Albedo Products EGU, Vienna April 27-28, 2005
2nd CEOS/WGCV/LPV Workshop on Albedo Products 2 n d C E O S / W G C V / L P V
W o r k s h o p
o n
A l b e d o
P r o d u c t s
EGU, Vienna April 27-28, 2005
page.normal_text:
The goal of this workshop is to design and initiate a validation and comparison exercise for the various satellite-derived land surface albedo products available. Wednesday Morning 8:30 Welcome - LPV Chair 8:45 BSRN Albedo Subgroup and Canadian Sites 9:10 BSRN Archive and Global Climate Results 9:35 ARM Site 10-10:30 Break 10:30 Eval. of UMD GEWEX/ISCCP Albedo Products 10:45 Sahelian Site 11:00 GOFC-Siberia2 11:15 DART Code to Validate Coarse Scale Albedo Sylvie Duthoit 12:00-13:30 Lunch
The goal of this workshop is to design and initiate a validation and
comparison exercise for the various satellite-derived land surface
albedo products available.

11:00 GOFC-Siberia2
11:15 DART Code to Validate Coarse Scale Albedo Sylvie Duthoit
12:00-13:30 Lunch

page.normal_text:
The goal of this workshop is to design and initiate a validation and comparison exercise for the various satellite-derived land surface albedo products available.
The goal of this workshop is to design and initiate a validation and comparison
exercise for the various satellite-derived land surface albedo products available.
page.enlisting:
▪ Definitions of albedo with regard to applications ▪ Ground measurements of albedo ▪ Temporal and spatial representativeness of ground measured albedo ▪ Comparisons between satellite albedo products and ground measurements ▪ Intercomparison between albedo products derived from different sensors/algorithms
